entry.title: Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 release candidate 1 available
entry.summary: Bitcoin Core version 0.13.0rc1 binaries are available for download from the official website. The release includes new features, bug fixes, and other improvements. Users can access the source code on GitHub under the signed tag. Release candidates are test versions of releases, and when no critical issues are found, the release candidate will be tagged as 0.13.0. Preliminary release notes for the version can be found on GitHub. Users can report bugs using the issue tracker on GitHub.
